channel.title: XG Evolution
channel.description:
http://www.xgevolution.com/forums/index.php this site is owned by Morsolo is a leet gaming website, due to the pruning that they had they had to start the forums over, so sadly all the posts and accs are gone help these forums get back on track and i know you will love them as much as i do so stay and wait for the big plans he is plannig if you come remember the site and try and advertise it/ stay active on it
and yes i got permission[br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2007, 06:34:00 AM[/size][hr]and yes i got permission
